text: Davina Lucy Pascale McCall (born 16 October 1967) is an English-French television presenter. She is best known for having presented the early seasons of Big Brother UK through its time on Channel 4. She was born in London to a French mother and British father. She is the presenter of quiz show The Million Pound Drop Live. She is also currently a judge on the UK Masked Singer. == References == *The real mcCall *Profile Davina McCall == Other websites == * Category:Actors from London Category:Channel 4 presenters Category:English television actors Category:English television presenters Category:ITV presenters Category:Television personalities from London Category:1967 births Category:Living people
title: Davina McCall
